title: Revenue of Vodafone Germany 2008 to 2019
summary: This statistic shows the Revenue of financial years 2008 in Vodafone Germany 2019 , years .
According to the report , 2018/19 apps experienced the highest Revenue with 10.68 billion compared to the previous year .

financial years 2008 in Vodafone Germany - additional informationMobile 2008 trends in Vodafone Germany are proving to be difficult to follow , and in turn problematic to forecast , as the ever-changing environment fluctuates year-over-year .
gold: This statistic shows the revenue development of Vodafone in Germany from the financial year 2008/09 to 2018/19 . In the financial year 2018/19 , Vodafone Germany generated revenues of roughly 10.31 billion euros .
